name: unprofessionally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not show the standard of behaviour that is expected from someone doing a particular job : She's acting unprofessionally, so you need to tackle this problem as soon as possible. The social worker behaved unprofessionally and was disrespectful. See
unprofessional
More examplesFewer examplesThe matter was handled unprofessionally but now it will be dealt with in a professional way. I was shocked at how unprofessionally many of their employees operated.Why are they allowed to behave so unprofessionally?
